sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import popularBooks from '../data/books'; import './Home.css'; const Home = () => { return (

Welcome to Our Book Store

Discover a world of knowledge with our extensive collection of books

Browse Books

Popular Books

{popularBooks.map((book) => (

{book.title}

by {book.author}

${book.price.toFixed(2)}

{'★'.repeat(Math.floor(book.rating))} {'☆'.repeat(5 - Math.floor(book.rating))} ({book.rating})
View Details
))}
View All Books

Browse by Category

Fiction Non-Fiction Science History
); }; export default Home;
